content.html: [quote comment="13298"]WOOT! Revision 20707 seems to have fixed my database table problems! I'll let you know how it goes! Thanks![/quote] good, good. I did a lot of testing yesterday using WP 2.2 and 2.3, PHP4 and PHP5, TextDrive and DreamHost hosting environments. When all was said and done, it worked beautifully in all of them. I think we're very close now.
